TRANSCRIPTS/STU/THE FINAL FREAKY DAY - B: "We hope you've been enjoying Boney Plays 2019."
"Did you see that video from the other day?"
"I'm just here to remind you it's the last day of this year's Boney Plays merchandise sale."
"After today, all the peril items will vanish at the stroke of midnight Pacific time."
"Our pins from this year will still be around."
"However, they are limited stock, so they might sell out soon and you'll miss out on that"
"pin you were dying to add to your collection."
"Thank you to all who have purchased from this year's merchandise line."
"Sales from this line go directly back into Only Plays, as well as other mysterious projects"
"Products disappear at midnight Pacific time tonight."
"Don't miss out, or else you'll regret it."
